Articles.Content:
This rocket should get you to the moon and back comfortably. If you want a challenge try removing the bottom stage.

Made in version 13.3

REQUIRES NOVAPUNCH PACK AND ADVANCED DECOUPLER MOD

This rocket should get you to the moon and back comfortably. If you want a challenge try removing the bottom stage.

For some reason I went when I saw the word Herobrine. Will try this when my computer is fixed.

A rocket so powerful...

It will send our three intrepid heroes to the hypothesized land of metre square cubes...

Hypothetically.

A rocket so powerful...

It will send our three intrepid heroes to the hypothesized land of metre square cubes...

Hypothetically.

Son, don\'t tempt fate. A bastardized mixture of Minecraft and KSP would mean the end of hard core people in both sides!

Why dig a mine when you can build a goofy as hell rocket and head to the Mun?

Why allow yourself to be shoehorned in a capsule with a slim chance of ever reaching the ground alive when you can sit back and set a forest on fire for lolz?

(Actually, I\'d love to see that mix... KerbalCraft? MineSpaceProgram? lolz)
